title: Bewitched and satisfied
text: Undoubtedly one of the best cafes’ I’ve been to! Tables outside and inside. The prices are quite low. I recommend the schwarzwald cake, it isn’t too sweet, too small or too-whatever ;), croissants are also perfect. Latte macchiato is tasty, very subtle and I wasn’t disappointed with the green tea - to be honest, I hadn’t drunk a better green tea before! I think that there is much more tasty food to try there :DD I liked the atmosphere, the decorations and the view of the street.

title: Must-be!
text: „Flam’s” is placed in a lovely aisle in the old part of the city. It has tables both outside and inside. The prices are fair (6€40 for a flamkuchen and about 3€ for a drink). The food is amazing, not too salty and not too bland. And the atmosphere is hard to be replaced :D The stuff is friendly, you can order in English.

title: Great experience
text: A very interesting museum. It was fantastic to see the original music sheets and to listen to Bach’s pieces played on the old instruments. A must see :)

title: Great!
text: Yummy food, nice prepared. The waiters were friendly. The food was served very quickly. A good place to eat a satisfying lunch.
